duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain a reliable, secure, and efficient data communications network.
Deploy, configure, maintain, and monitor all active network equipment to ensure smooth network operations.
Support and administer third-party applications and ensure network security and connectivity.
Monitor network performance and test for weaknesses, as well as resolve problems reported by end users.
Define network policies and procedures, and research and make recommendations on network system administration.
Write technical and end-user documentation for assigned projects and provide necessary system, maintenance, and disaster recovery plan documents.
Prepare management reports related to system audit, availability, and performance as needed.
Serves as a technical resource or mentor to other employees and may lead or instruct less experienced workers in high-level or technical jobs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or Engineering or related field (Master’s preferred)
Certification in CCNA, Network+, and / or ITIL highly desired
